TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceReference extends System.Object

summary.span: 注册要在网页中使用的 Web 服务。

span.span: Registers a Web service for use in a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要从 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 中调用 Web 服务方法，您必须在 ASP.NET 页中包含的服务引用并应用属性为 Web 服务类定义。To call Web service methods from ECMAScript (JavaScript), you must include a service reference in the ASP.NET page and apply the attribute to the Web service class definition. 如果包括对中的 Web 服务的服务引用或ASP.NET 页上，将在浏览器中实例化对象的 JavaScript 中的控件。If you include a service reference to a Web service in the or control inside the ASP.NET page, JavaScript objects will be instantiated in the browser. 代理对象将用于执行以下操作：The proxy objects will be used to do the following: - 向 Web 服务方法在 JavaScript 中发出异步请求Make asynchronous requests in JavaScript to Web service methods, - 初始化实例的代理的服务器数据类型，特别是作为用于调用 Web 方法的输入参数。Initialize instances of proxies of server data types, in particular for use as input parameters for invoking Web methods. > [!NOTE] > 控件仅可用于同一域中的服务。The control can only be used for services in the same domain. 您可以通过添加以声明方式定义 Web 服务定位``元素``元素内的``页，然后设置上的元素及其属性，如下面的示例中所示。You can define the Web service location declaratively by adding an `` element to the `` element inside the `` element on the page, and then setting its attribute, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 可以使用属性以指示代理生成脚本作为内联脚本块的页中包含还是通过单独的请求获取。You might use the property to indicate whether the proxy generation script is included in the page as an inline script block or is obtained by a separate request. 您可以以编程方式添加对象，通过或通过使用集合方法类。You can also programmatically add a object through the or collection by using the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在页面标记，以从脚本调用 Web 服务方法中添加对 Web 服务的引用。The following example demonstrates how to add a reference to a Web service in the page markup to call the Web service methods from script. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute/CS/Default.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute/VB/Default.aspx#5)]

The proxy script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `containingControl`参数是对象或对其对象定义对象。The `containingControl` parameter is the object or object on which the object is defined. 它应为基础的相对 URL 解析。It should be used as a basis for relative URL resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `containingControl`参数是对象或对其对象对象定义和应用于相对 URL 解析为基础。The `containingControl` parameter is the object or object on which the object is defined and should be used as a basis for relative URL resolution.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是将代理生成脚本作为内联脚本块包含在页上还是通过单独的请求获取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the proxy generation script is included in the page as an inline script block or is obtained by a separate request.

value.span: 如果代理生成脚本作为内联脚本块包含在页上，则为 ；如果通过单独的请求获取代理生成脚本，则为 。

span.span: if the proxy generation script is included as an inline script block in the page; if the proxy generation script is obtained by a separate request.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性未声明，则默认值为`false`。When the property is not declared, the default value is `false`. 当设置为`false`，用于生成 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 代理脚本下载为单独的脚本文件到服务器的其他请求。When is set to `false`, the script for generating the ECMAScript (JavaScript) proxies is downloaded as a separate script file by an additional request to the server. 如果使用浏览器缓存，则此选项非常有用，当多个 Web 页面使用相同的服务引用时。If you use browser caching, this option is helpful when multiple Web pages use the same service reference. 当设置为`true`、 代理生成脚本时，包含作为内联脚本块的页中。When is set to `true`, the proxy generation script is included as an inline script block in the page. 这可以减少网络请求数量，尤其是在页中有多个服务引用，而其他页面不引用相同的服务来提高服务器性能。This can improve server performance by reducing the number of network requests, especially if there are many service references in the page and other pages do not reference the same services. 此外，属性必须设置为相对路径时设置为`true`。In addition, the property must be set to a relative path when is set to `true`.

.property instance string Path
Public Overridable Property Path As String

summary.span: 获取或设置引用的 Web 服务的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the referenced Web service.

value.span: 引用的 Web 服务的路径。

span.span: The path of the referenced Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以指向仅为本地 Web 服务。The property can point only to local Web services. 换而言之，此属性仅可以指向与启用了 AJAX 的 ASP.NET Web 应用程序相同的域中的 Web 服务。In other words, this property can only point to Web services in the same domain as your AJAX-enabled ASP.NET Web application. 可以是相对、 相对于应用程序、 域相对或绝对路径。 can be a relative, application-relative, domain-relative, or absolute path. 如果属性设置为`true`，则必须使用指向相同的 Web 应用程序作为包含的页的相对路径实例。If the property is set to `true`, then you must use a relative path that points to the same Web application as the page that contains the instance.
